title: Ep 524 | Jase Goes Full Robertson & What Exactly Is God's Faithfulness?
description:
Jase tells the story of a classic family dispute ... at the time of a funeral. Zach laughs about some of the more difficult Robertson personality traits. Phil says he has never followed a guest out to the car to continue the discussion. Al reminds Phil of the first time he met Gordon, Zach's dad. Phil points to the book of John and how our current position is such that there is no sin. And Jase explains how it's really about God's faithfulness and not ours.
